mapper.insert: insert into Diary(did, peid, d_memo, d_img, d_date, d_special, d_walk, d_flag) values(#{did}, #{peid}, #{d_memo}, #{d_img}, #{d_date}, #{d_special}, #{d_walk}, 0)
mapper.select: select * from Diary where d_date=#{d_date} and peid=#{peid} and d_flag=0
select w_img from Walk where peid=#{peid} and date(w_date)=#{d_date} and w_flag=0 order by w_date asc;
select count(*) as count, sum(w_distance) as distance, sum(w_time) as time from Walk where peid=#{peid} and date(w_date)=#{d_date} and w_flag=0;
select date_format(d_date, '%Y-%m-%d') from Diary where peid=#{peid} and d_flag=0
